attributes.action: Pause Ofsted during the COVID-19 pandemic
attributes.background:
Ofsted have said they are continuing inspections during the COVID-19 pandemic.

This places an incredible level of stress on schools and colleges, who currently need to focus on contingency planning as well as teaching pupils skills like hand washing.

This is an emergency. Ofsted can wait.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, Ofsted has announced the suspension of routine inspections

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/routine-ofsted-inspections-suspended-in-response-to-coronavirus
